Key Match Events: Coby White made a go-ahead layup with 47 seconds left.
Zach LaVine had 35 points, 10 rebounds and eight assists.
Nikola Vucevic had 24 points and 11 boards.
Devin Vassell threw away the ball for San Antonio after White's layup.
White then drove into the lane and dunked over Victor Wembanyama.
Victor Wembanyama had 23 points, 14 rebounds and eight blocks.
Chris Paul added 18 points and nine assists.
Chicago used an 11-0 run to trim San Antonio's lead to 79-71.
Paul made two foul shots, a pullup jumper and a 3-pointer to extend the Spurs' advantage to 86-73.
San Antonio led 110-103 with 3:53 left, but Vucevic and LaVine each made a 3 to get Chicago within one with 2:38 to go.
Chicago went 5 for 8 from 3 in the fourth quarter, compared to 1 for 9 for San Antonio.
